amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management by $9,961,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 43 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the appropriation for the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management by $9,961,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 221 (Roll no. 454).
